mapper.select: select bmf.id, bmf.product_id, bp.name, (select item.tag_price from bu_product_item item where item.del_flag = '0' and item.product_id = bp.id order by item.sale_price limit 1) as tag_price, (select item.sale_price from bu_product_item item where item.del_flag = '0' and item.product_id = bp.id order by item.sale_price limit 1) as sale_price, pic.pic as pic from bu_product bp left join bu_member_footprint bmf on bp.id = bmf.product_id left join bu_product_pic pic on pic.product_id = bp.id where bmf.del_flag = '0' and pic.del_flag = '0' and pic.is_default = '1' and FUN_GET_PRODUCT_ACTIVITY_STATUS(bp.id) in (2,3,4) and bmf.member_id = #{memberId} AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT spa.id FROM bu_single_product_activity spa WHERE spa.product_id = bmf.product_id AND spa.status = '1' AND spa.`type` IN(7,8,10)) order by bmf.create_date desc limit #{currentPage} , #{pageSize}

select count(1) from bu_product bp left join bu_member_footprint bmf on bp.id = bmf.product_id left join bu_product_pic pic on pic.product_id = bp.id where bmf.del_flag = '0' and pic.del_flag = '0' and pic.is_default = '1' and FUN_GET_PRODUCT_ACTIVITY_STATUS(bp.id) in (2,3,4) and bmf.member_id = #{memberId} AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT spa.id FROM bu_single_product_activity spa WHERE spa.product_id = bmf.product_id AND spa.status = '1' AND spa.`type` IN(7,8,10))

select distinct p.product_type_id from bu_member_footprint bmf left join bu_product p on bmf.product_id = p.id where bmf.member_id = #{memberId} and bmf.create_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 90 DAY) and bmf.del_flag = '0' and p.del_flag = 0 order by bmf.create_date desc limit 5

SELECT a.id,a.product_id,bp.name, (CASE bp.sale_type WHEN 1 THEN bp.min_tag_price ELSE (SELECT item.tag_price FROM bu_product_item item WHERE item.id = bp.min_sale_price_item_id) END) AS tag_price, (CASE bp.sale_type WHEN 1 THEN bp.min_mall_price ELSE (SELECT item.sale_price FROM bu_product_item item WHERE item.id = bp.min_sale_price_item_id) END) AS saleOrMallPrice, (SELECT pic.pic FROM bu_product_pic pic WHERE pic.product_id = bp.id AND pic.del_flag = '0' AND pic.is_default = '1' LIMIT 1) AS pic FROM ( SELECT bmf.id,bmf.product_id FROM bu_member_footprint bmf LEFT JOIN bu_product p ON bmf.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN bu_mcht_info mi ON p.mcht_id = mi.id LEFT JOIN bu_product_brand pb ON p.brand_id = pb.id LEFT JOIN bu_mcht_product_brand mpb ON p.brand_id = mpb.product_brand_id AND mpb.mcht_id = mi.id WHERE bmf.id IN (SELECT d.id FROM (SELECT id FROM bu_member_footprint WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 1000) d) AND p.del_flag = '0' AND p.status = '1' AND p.audit_status = '2' AND mi.del_flag = '0' AND mi.status = '1' AND pb.del_flag = '0' AND pb.status = '1' AND mpb.del_flag ='0' AND mpb.status = '1' AND mpb.audit_status = '3' AND bmf.product_id != #{currentProductId} AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT spa.id FROM bu_single_product_activity spa WHERE spa.product_id = bmf.product_id AND spa.status = '1' AND spa.`type` IN(7,8,10)) GROUP BY bmf.product_id ORDER BY bmf.update_date DESC LIMIT #{currentPage} , #{pageSize} ) a LEFT JOIN bu_product bp ON a.product_id = bp.id

select count(*) from bu_product bp left join bu_member_footprint bmf on bp.id = bmf.product_id where bmf.del_flag = '0' and FUN_GET_PRODUCT_ACTIVITY_STATUS(bp.id) in (2,3,4) and bmf.member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM bu_member_footprint mf WHERE mf.member_id = #{memberId} AND mf.create_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
